people_also_viewed.about: Founder at Vezado® | Serial Entrepreneur | Corporate Innovation | Investor | Adviser | Influencer | All Views Expressed Are Personal

recommendations: Deepanshu Manchanda “Amazing personality, Highly enthusiastic, Keeps a smiling face always. I know Santosh as a thorough gentlemen with exemplary business acumen. Explara.com is gunning for a breakthrough in event bookings and I am amazed at the pace its moving. Wish you & your team, All the success.”

Desigan Chinniah “Always amazed by Santosh's agnostic development attitude from Java to Rails to Python and back again. Santosh gets things done with his imaginative, dependable and always can do attitude. Enjoys vast experience in the big bad corporation world, but probably is more of an asset in a faster agile paced startup and innovative environment. Normally my source of what book to read next!”
